title: Learning Journey AI
description: Project‑based learning platform focused on workforce AI skill development. Built the early product and content strategy; coordinating pilots with practitioners.

title: Witness Witness
description: 7th Congressional Hackathon demo that scraped witness lists from hearing webpages and assembled a browsable database.

title: Materials Simulation Agent
description: Hackathon project (BASIS) to streamline density functional theory (DFT) calculations with LLM agents; implemented the literature‑search components.

title: NSF AI Institutes — overview dashboard (prototype)
description: Internal prototype for summarizing portfolio and program metrics across a $540M multi‑year initiative. Built with Python and modern LLM tooling.
